mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id, s.name, s.number, s.start_time, s.end_time, s.create_time FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
